donation.title: Unoffical Donation
donation.text1: Your donate is our power to keep iM running!
donation.text2: Recent years, iM did not ask for donation from users, but after a year, we've noticed that the maintenance cost of iM is gradually increasing, in order to main the high and stable quality, we've made a few improvements in the latest update, and future versions will be bringing everyone a better experience continously. I hope you can give some support to make this community robust!
donation.text3: You will be able to make your iM colorful by your donation!

creation.title: Statement of 2nd creation
creation.text1: Rayark allows us to make iM system, but Rayark did not authorized the second creation authorization.
creation.text2: iM System is produced by iM group, following the Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Taiwan (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 TW)

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text: We are a team of people who love Cytus2.
